rows.title: Sandy Lane - Windward
rows.description: Windward - a luxurious two-storey villa on Cooper Hill within Sandy Lane Estate in Barbados with a swimming pool featuring 5 bedrooms suites and 6.5  bathrooms. The villa sits in over 1.5 acres of carefully landscaped grounds featuring “secret” sitting areas with benches for guests to escape and relax in spectacular tropical gardens. The property is private, fully enclosed and gated, with a main front foyer and a side entrance via the courtyard. Within the grounds there is a separate building housing a fully equipped gym, garage and storeroom. On entering Windward through the main entrance foyer, a beautiful designed double staircase finished with a wrought iron railing leads upstairs to the stunning master suite, study and two additional bedrooms. All bedroom suites are air conditioned with ceiling fans, safes and cable TV. The en suite bathrooms feature marble finishes, double vanities and rain showers, with the exception of the master which includes a tub, large rain shower. There is also a powder room by the main foyer.

address.full: Windward House, 99a Cooper Hill, Holetown, Barbados

rows.title: Sandy view
rows.description:
Sandy View is a 1,700 square foot beachfront penthouse duplex apartment on the West Coast of Barbados. This luxury holiday home is immaculately presented with high vaulted ceilings and 2 dining areas. There is a fully equipped granite kitchen,  living / TV area and 3 bedrooms each with private en-suite bathrooms. In addition, the covered and uncovered terraces at Sandy View offer stunning Caribbean Sea and beach views.

The home is located on the edge of charming and historic Speightstown and directly opposite a beautiful beach with safe swimming. This beachfront penthouse duplex apartment is also within walking distance to shops, bars and waterfront restaurants.

rows.title: Still Fathoms
rows.description: Still Fathoms is a modern and stylish villa located directly on the ocean at Reed's Bay on the West Coast of Barbados. Guests can sun bathe in the beachfront garden, or around the plunge pool, or relax on the shaded terrace with a cool drink, whilst still enjoying the Caribbean Sea view. The ground level of this vacation rental features a spacious living room / TV area, which opens directly onto the covered terrace, offering plenty of comfortable seating, as well as an alfresco dining area. The modern and well-equipped kitchen just steps away. All five bedrooms are located on the upper level of the villa, with the master bedroom and bedroom 2 having balconies directly overlooking the garden and ocean. All of the bedrooms are air-conditioned, with ceiling fans and en suite bathrooms. There is also a small TV room on the upper level. The décor of the villa is stylish, featuring cool blues and bright tropical colours with whimsical touches of an "undersea" theme.

address.full: Still Fathoms, Hwy 1B, Lower Carlton, Saint. James, Speightstown, Barbados

rows.title: Sugar Hill - Eden
rows.description: Nestled within an acre of lush tropical gardens in the exclusive Sugar Hill community this luxurious colonial-style five-bedroom vacation rental is a true Barbados paradise. The grand entrance, accessed from the private driveway, features a sweeping marble staircase to the open plan living area. Here, the entertainment centre includes a 42-inch high definition television, a wide range of satellite TV channels and top quality Wi-Fi, with Sonos wireless music system, CD player, iPod link and individually controlled speakers. Three sets of doors open from the living room onto a magnificent covered terrace, with stunning views of the gardens and the sparkling Caribbean Sea beyond.

address.full: Sugar Hill: Eden, Sugar Hill Estate, Saint. James, Holetown, Barbados

rows.title: Tom Tom
rows.description: Tom Tom is a well-appointed five-bedroom luxury vacation rental located in Westmoreland St. James overlooking the exclusive West Coast of Barbados. The large wooden front door of the villa leads to an exquisite interior of natural coral stone walls, wooden floors, furnished with beautiful custom-made furniture imported directly from Indonesia and Bali with Caribbean influences. The villa was designed by London architect, Harper Downie and was completed in late 2007. The spacious formal living room features handmade Balinese stone carvings and opens up to an outdoor terrace complete with a large infinity-edge pool and uninterrupted views of the Caribbean Sea. When lit up at night Tom Tom's pool deck transforms into a magical private setting perfect for an evening of cocktails, a midnight swim or stargazing. The open plan, the well-equipped kitchen flows through to the dining area situated on the terrace and offers alfresco dining with wonderful views. There is also a barbeque grill on the terrace for more casual culinary moments!

address.full: Tom Tom, Westmoreland, Saint James, Holetown, Barbados

rows.title: Villa Nirvana
rows.description:
Nirvana is a luxury beachfront Barbados villa. Nirvana lives up to its name thanks to its waterfront location within the prestigious Fitts Village area of the Platinum Coast region in Barbados. A five-bedroom and five-bathroom gem, it offers a one-stop holiday destination thanks to its long list of premium amenities and its full, household staff. That means visitors enjoy the attentive services of a housekeeping team and an on-call property manager, but also two meals daily prepared by their private chef.

As if that were not enough, the three-story villa features an abundance of onsite amenities and spaces that guarantee an unforgettable experience whether visiting with a group of friends or family. It starts on the ground level where an oversized terrace features a large open-air banquette sofa lounge, a sun deck, a small swath of lawn, an al fresco dining area, and the oversized plunge pool. All of this faces out towards the sea and serves as the perfect spot to savor sunset each day.

It backs up to the verandah which is also designed to work as an outdoor living space with a lounge, barbecue area, and direct access into the kitchen space. Here, you find an oversized dining table that opens towards a large breakfast bar and then into the gourmet kitchen. Oversized and designed to allow anyone to enjoy easy drink or meal prep, it faces out towards the views and may not get much use thanks to the presence of a house chef!

The main level also features a large and elegant foyer, with curving stairs to the upper floors. The shared living spaces don’t end here, though, because of the addition of a large and beautifully furnished rooftop deck with a full bar and lots of lounging spaces adds to the ways guests will be able to enjoy the premises.

The five bedrooms are divided between the ground and upper floors. The master suite is on the upper level and opens to a private balcony. The other bedrooms are also all king suites (or can be converted to king suites) and feature large and private baths. Two of the remaining four also feature a balcony, as does the ground-floor bedroom, which opens to the pool terrace.

Perfectly sized for a group of friends traveling together, the Villa Nirvana – Barbados can serve as an amazing base from which to explore the island or as your sole destination itself thanks to its wonderful array of luxury amenities and services.
